title: The Office (US)
description: Documentary on people in an office

title: South Park
description: Four boys try to make it through school

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
description: A hilarious police precinct in Brooklyn, led by the quirky Detective Jake Peralta.

title: Silicon Valley
description: A group of software engineers try to build a startup company in Silicon Valley.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student to secure his family's future.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to and into his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

title: Black Mirror
description: A bunch of weird episodes

title: Stranger Things
description: In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.

title: Friends
description: Six friends living in New York navigate life, love, and laughter.

title: How I Met Your Mother
description: Ted recounts to his children the series of events that led to him meeting their mother.

title: Community
description: A group of misfit students form a quirky community at a community college.

title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
description: A group of friends who own a bar create chaos with their misanthropic behavior.

title: 30 Rock
description: Behind-the-scenes comedy about a TV sketch show, led by Liz Lemon and her eccentric boss.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
description: A young boy, the last airbender, embarks on an epic journey to master all four elements and bring peace to the world.

title: The Legend of Korra
description: Set years after Avatar Aang's time, a new Avatar, Korra, fights to keep balance in the world as threats emerge.

title: Adventure Time
description: Follow Finn the Human and Jake the Dog on their surreal adventures in the post-apocalyptic Land of Ooo.

title: The Simpsons
description: An animated series that follows the satirical adventures of a dysfunctional family living in Springfield.

title: The Nanny
description: A charming and loud New Yorker unexpectedly becomes the nanny for a wealthy British family.

title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
description: After being rescued from a doomsday cult, Kimmy Schmidt tries to start over in New York City.

title: Orange is the New Black
description: A privileged New Yorker ends up in a womenâ€™s prison, where her life takes many unexpected turns.

title: Mean Girls
description: A new girl in high school navigates the treacherous world of cliques and learns the harsh realities of popularity.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the chance to erase his criminal past by planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: The Butterfly Effect
description: A man discovers that he can time travel and tries to fix his past, but it has unintended consequences on his present and future.

title: Morning Glory
description: An ambitious TV producer takes on the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show with a difficult anchor duo.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble one last time to reverse the actions of Thanos and restore balance to the universe.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 1
description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

title: Deadpool
description: A wisecracking mercenary with a penchant for breaking the fourth wall embarks on a quest for revenge after gaining incredible healing abilities.

title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

title: Parks and Recreation
description: Leslie Knope tries to improve her small town with her eccentric coworkers.

title: Veep
description: A satirical look at the life of a female vice president of the United States.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Harry Potter, an orphan, discovers he is a wizard and begins his studies at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Harry returns to Hogwarts and discovers an ancient secret within the school's chambers.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
description: Harry faces a new threat in the form of Sirius Black, a dangerous wizard who has escaped from Azkaban.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: Harry competes in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament while Voldemort begins to regain his power.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Harry battles the Ministry of Magic and Voldemort's growing influence while forming a secret group to fight back.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: Harry uncovers more about Voldemort's past while Hogwarts comes under increasing danger.
